one_reviews_text: This game replicates real-life physics well. Obviously, it can't be the same exact as real life but it is pretty close to me. If there isn't a way to use the thumbstick to walk instead of teleport, then I would reccomend adding that to this game. Other than that, cheap price for an awesome game!

I don't understand why this game doesn't cost more.  You get  incredibly realistic physics, a great workout, and the opportunity to practice shooting without leaving your home. You'll easily work up a sweat within the first couple minutes of playing.  According the move app I burned over 300 calories playing this game alone today.  This game is an asset.
im a hooper, and this is probably the best basketball vr game hands down.
